Janaki Raman Designs

Where architecture meets purpose and innovation

Established in 2000, Janaki Raman Designs has grown into a name synonymous with excellence in architectural design. With a legacy of crafting impactful spaces, we specialize in designing structures that blend functionality with aesthetic appeal.

Achievements Timeline

2001

Commercial Complex

Designed for Zila Parishad, Begusarai, Bihar.

2004

Vishwesaraiya Institute

Conceptualized the Institute of Sanitation & Water Academy, Ranchi, Jharkhand.

2006

City Bus Terminus

Transformed transit experience in Munger, Bihar.

2008

Seevusagar Ramgulam Statue

First Prize in the Government of Bihar Design Competition.

2010

Shri Krishna Nagar Housing

First Prize in Housing Design Competition.

2012

Bihar State Guest House

First Prize in Design Competition.
